channel.title: Posts on AGRF Summit 2023
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on AGRF Summit 2023

item.title: About
item.description: Africa’s Food Systems Forum 2023 Summit’s theme, “Recover, Regenerate, Act: Africa’s Solutions to Food Systems Transformation,” focuses on building back better food systems and food sovereignty with youth and women at the center. The theme identifies three steps needed to achieve this transformation: Recovery, Regenerate, and Act.
